author: dain
msg: Upgraded to OpenJPA 0.9.7-SNAPSHOT which fixes many minor query errors

author: dain
msg: Upgraded to OpenJPA 0.9.7-SNAPSHOT which fixes many minor query errors
Allow null values in finder and ejbSelect results
A single valued finder or ejbSelect that returns one null item is allowed
A single valued finder or ejbSelect that returns no items throws an ObjectNotFoundException
Return a LinkedHashSet for ejbSelects that return a set so order is preserved
Don't use cross class loader jndi references for app client references since these are already being copied by the ejbd protocol
Invalidated proxy after remove should throw EJBException to callers and not ObjectNotFoundException
All CMR fields must be bi-directional regardless of how the user declared them so when a bean is deleted related beans can be notified

author: joakime
msg: Updating with changes surrounding model, and database schema, change
